title: Did the Union complain that Trump said "American" many times in Union State?
subtitle: The unreliable websites distorted the content of the American Civil Liberties Union; the cash response to President Trump and Baros; and he made a statement.
author: David Emery
vclaim: In response to President Trump Andbos' 2018 speech in Union State, the American Civil Liberties Union has complained that he has used the word "American" more than 80 times.
